item.title: XEN information and documentation - Robdyke.com wikwikwah
item.description: Here are some things I am working on at present. XEN information and documentation - Robdyke.com wikwikwah. We’re researching using xen on a colo server with a bunch of other free software to provide a range of communication & collaboration tools. Many of the tools I’ve been looking at are tagged up.

item.title: grub
item.description: using grub 0.97 to provide failover kernel boot. http://www.gnu.org/software/grub/manual/html_node/Booting-fallback-systems.html#Booting-fallback-systems
